title: Autonomous Vehicle User Education: Tutorial Based on a Four-Stage Instructional Design Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Vehicle Operation and General Traffic Rules
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining actual driving simulations with theoretical instruction, including individual device-based learning activities and collaborative discussion sessions

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles (Level 2/3) and operational mechanisms of autonomous driving systems.
Learners can recognize the safety features and system limitations of autonomous vehicles and perform emergency response procedures.
Learners can identify potential errors occurring during interactions with autonomous driving systems and respond appropriately.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
